Package com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands

Class JDAContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands.JDAContext
  • public class JDAContext
extends Object
    Wrapper class for JDA and ShardManager. Use performTask(Consumer) when you need to do work with an JDA object.
    Since:
    2.3.0
    Version:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Kaktushose

      Constructs a new JDAContext.

      • performTask

        Parameters:

      • getJDAObject

        public Object getJDAObject()
        Gets the JDA instance as an Object. This can either be JDA or a ShardManager. Use isShardManager() to distinguish.
        Returns:
        the JDA instance.

      • isShardManager

        public boolean isShardManager()
        Deprecated.
        Whether the JDA instance is a ShardManager.
        Returns:
        true if the JDA instance is a ShardManager

      • getGuilds

        public List<net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild> getGuilds()
        An unmodifiable List of all Guilds that the logged account is connected to. If this account is not connected to any Guilds, this will return an empty list. This copies the backing store into a list. This means every call creates a new list with O(n) complexity. It is recommended to store this into a local variable or use getGuildCache() and use its more efficient versions of handling these values.
        Returns:
        Possibly-empty list of all the Guilds that this account is connected to.

      • getGuildCache

        public net.dv8tion.jda.api.utils.cache.SnowflakeCacheView<net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild> getGuildCache()
        SnowflakeCacheView of all cached Guilds.
        Returns:
        SnowflakeCacheView
